param.name: wuser
param.label: User name
param.help: Username for account on the Workflow Host. Your PW account username will automatically substitute __USER__; other values will be treated as typed.

param.name: whost
param.label: Workflow host
param.help: Use PoolName.clusters.pw for cloud clusters or user@host_ip otherwise

param.name: rundir
param.label: Run directory
param.help: Path to the job directory on the host. In general, the compute nodes have access to this directory.

param.name: runcmd
param.label: Run command
param.help: Name of the script or command to run from inside the run directory

param.name: spaces_in_runcmd
param.label: Are there spaces (flags) in the run command, above?
param.help: By default, spaces between flags are turned into _. With True, a filter is engaged that will convert them back to spaces. Note that this fiter is not sophisticated, it will change ANY _ to spaces, including _ in the command name or flag names.

param.name: head_or_worker
param.label: Which type of node to run on?
param.help: Select whether to run on the head node or a worker node

param.name: slurm_or_pbs
param.label: Which scheduler is on the cluster?
param.help: Select whether this is a SLURM or PBS cluster.
